data.name: Vitality Girl Ⅱ:Fire
data.detailed_description:
is a cartoon style bullet screen shooting game. The game adopts the horizontal version of the game, and players will take various adventures on an illusory continent. In the game, you can equip your characters with various weapons. You can wear up to 4 suspension balls that follow you and customize their bullets.

[game features]
It can be matched by players. It can be roughly divided into the following types.
Scattering: can attack enemies in a wide range.
Penetration: can penetrate terrain and enemies.
Split: after hitting the target, it will split multiple bullets to attack again.
Tracking: automatically find the enemy.

[game mode]
Breakthrough mode: you can obtain bullets, gold coins, experience and materials.
Endless mode: you can get a lot of gold coins.
Challenge mode: you can gain a lot of experience.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,Windows10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
